oldVersionNotice.displayName: New node version available: get the latest version with added features from the nodes panel.
oldVersionNotice.name: oldVersionNotice

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。 与鉴权相关，注意不要在公共日志中输出敏感信息。

resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation

options.name: Add
options.action: Add a label to a message

options.name: Remove
options.action: Remove a label from a message

operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

includeHtml.name: includeHtml
includeHtml.description: Whether the message should also be included as HTML

additionalFields.name: additionalFields

options.name: dataPropertyAttachmentsPrefixName
options.description: Prefix for name of the binary property to which to write the attachment. An index starting with 0 will be added. So if name is "attachment_" the first attachment is saved to "attachment_0".

options.name: format
Full
options.description: Returns the full email message data with body content parsed in the payload field

options.name: IDs
options.description: Returns only the IDs of the emails

options.name: Metadata
options.description: Returns only email message ID, labels, and email headers

options.name: Minimal
options.description: Returns only email message ID and labels; does not return the email headers, body, or payload

options.name: RAW
options.description: Returns the full email message data with body content in the raw field as a base64url encoded string; the payload field is not used

options.name: Resolved
options.description: Returns the full email with all data resolved and attachments saved as binary data
The format to return the message in

options.name: includeSpamTrash
options.description: Whether to include messages from SPAM and TRASH in the results

options.name: labelIds
options.description: Only return messages with labels that match all of the specified label IDs. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

options.name: q
options.description: Only return messages matching the specified query. Supports the same query format as the Gmail search box. For example, "from:someuser@example.com rfc822msgid:<somemsgid@example.com> is:unread". Parameter cannot be used when accessing the api using the gmail.metadata scope.

additionalFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.ai_hint: Max number of results to return

labelListVisibility.name: labelListVisibility
labelListVisibility.description: The visibility of the label in the label list in the Gmail web interface
labelListVisibility.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

messageListVisibility.name: messageListVisibility
messageListVisibility.description: The visibility of messages with this label in the message list in the Gmail web interface
messageListVisibility.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

toList.name: toList
toList.description: The email addresses of the recipients
toList.ai_hint: The email addresses of the recipients

labelIds.name: labelIds
labelIds.description: The ID of the label. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.
labelIds.ai_hint: The ID of the label. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

conditional_rules: IF resource == 'draft' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'draft' AND operation IN ["delete", "get"] THEN SHOW parameter 'messageId'
IF resource == 'draft' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'subject'
IF resource == 'draft' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'includeHtml'
IF includeHtml == True AND resource == 'draft' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'htmlMessage'
IF resource == 'draft' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'message'
IF resource == 'draft' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'draft' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF format IN ["full", "metadata", "minimal", "raw"] THEN HIDE parameter 'dataPropertyAttachmentsPrefixName'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'draft' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'draft' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'draft' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF format IN ["full", "ids", "metadata", "minimal", "raw"] THEN HIDE parameter 'dataPropertyAttachmentsPrefixName'
IF resource == 'label' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'label' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'name'
IF resource == 'label' AND operation IN ["get", "delete"] THEN SHOW parameter 'labelId'
IF resource == 'label' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'labelListVisibility'
IF resource == 'label' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'messageListVisibility'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'label' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'label' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'message' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation IN ["get", "delete"] THEN SHOW parameter 'messageId'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'reply' THEN SHOW parameter 'threadId'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'reply' THEN SHOW parameter 'messageId'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation IN ["reply", "send"] THEN SHOW parameter 'subject'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation IN ["send", "reply"] THEN SHOW parameter 'includeHtml'
IF includeHtml == True AND resource == 'message' AND operation IN ["reply", "send"] THEN SHOW parameter 'htmlMessage'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation IN ["reply", "send"] THEN SHOW parameter 'message'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation IN ["reply", "send"] THEN SHOW parameter 'toList'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation IN ["send", "reply"] THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'message' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'message' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'message' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'messageLabel' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'messageLabel' AND operation IN ["add", "remove"] THEN SHOW parameter 'messageId'
IF resource == 'messageLabel' AND operation IN ["add", "remove"] THEN SHOW parameter 'labelIds'
